Works fine, thanks.

How to install:

1. Run Setup.exe. This will install Steam if you don't have it installed.
2. When setup asks for activation, simply minimize it and run steambackup.exe.
3. Select your Steam folder (C:\Program Files\Steam by default).
4. Wait until steambackup finishes, it may take up to 10 min.
5. Press Cancel in Steam setup.
6. In your Steam folder you'll find subfolder named "Kane & Lynch 2- Dog Days". Open it and copy crack from Crack folder on iso there.

That's it.

Few more tips:

- You don't need any serial number.
- You don't need to uninstall Steam before game setup if you have it installed.
- You may uninstall Steam afterwards if you don't need it as the game doesn't require it running.

I could NOT fucking BELIEVE how short this game was. It had so much potential. This doesn't even hold a candle to the first one. They sacrificed the single player for the multiplayer bullshit which noone is going to play.

There was no climax to the story, Lynch's insanity wasn't even PRESENT in the damn game, nor did it cause any problems for Kane. All he did was kill some high up dude, but that was revenge ANY of us would've sank out teeth into, not insanity or instability. This is just horrible and lazy, and I would be so flaming pissed off if I had spent fifty fucking dollars on this game. Holy shit am I glad I tried it here first.

Seriously, I thought this was going to be one of those games I bought this year. Looks like I was wrong.

HOW DO YOU UNINSTALL THIS?? PLEASE HELP:/
Can you uninstall it by just deleting the install folder?

1. Mount the Image with PowerISO
2. Run Setup.exe
3. Wait for it to go to "Enter Keycode"
4. Minimize and run Steambackup.exe
5. Click Ok, if the program crashes, open it again but this time click Cancel
6. Choose a Folder to install it in to
7. Wait for it to finish
8. Copy + Paste the files inside Crack folder to the installation folder.

Sound Issue: If you hear no sound, go to the game installation directory, then "Redist", and "Openal", run oalinst.exe (Logo should be a red "AL")
